attributes.action: The UK should remain part of the EU if there is a "No Deal" scenario
attributes.additional_details: As the time grows closer it becomes ever more apparent that the deal the UK Gov't is going to be able to make with the EU27 is likely to be a "no deal" scenario or at best a much worse deal than we have being a member state. If the whole point of the referendum was to get a better deal for the country than we already have as part of the EU, then if no better deal can be reached the logical step is to remain and work to change the system from within.
attributes.background: The UK Government should revoke Article 50 and remain part of the EU if they are unable to negotiate a better deal for Brexit than staying part of the EU. The country voted to leave but did not vote to economically destroy the nation for generations to come!
